MemberSignature.Value: public HarfBuzzSharp.ClusterLevel ClusterLevel { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype HarfBuzzSharp.ClusterLevel ClusterLevel

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the cluster level of the buffer.
Docs.remarks: The cluster level dictates how HarfBuzz will treat non-base characters during shaping.

MemberSignature.Value: public HarfBuzzSharp.ContentType ContentType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype HarfBuzzSharp.ContentType ContentType

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of content in the buffer.
Docs.remarks: Buffers can contain either Unicode characters (before shaping) or glyphs (after shaping).

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
Docs.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

MemberSignature.Value: public uint InvisibleGlyph { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int32 InvisibleGlyph

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the glyph ID used for invisible characters.
Docs.value: The glyph ID for invisible characters, or 0 to use the default behavior.
Docs.remarks: This glyph is used for characters marked as invisible in the Unicode database.

MemberSignature.Value: public HarfBuzzSharp.Language Language { get; set; }
.property instance class HarfBuzzSharp.Language Language

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the language of the text in the buffer.
Docs.value: The language, or if not set.
Docs.remarks: Language is used by some OpenType features to customize shaping behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Length { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Length

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer.
Docs.remarks: If the new length is greater that the current length, more memory will be allocated. If the new length is less than the current length, the extra items will be cleared.

MemberSignature.Value: public void NormalizeGlyphs ();
.method public hidebysig instance void NormalizeGlyphs() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reorders glyphs so that they can be run through subsequent phases consistently.
Docs.remarks: This ensures that clusters of glyphs are arranged in a canonical order after shaping.

MemberSignature.Value: public uint ReplacementCodepoint { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int32 ReplacementCodepoint

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the code point used to replace invalid characters during text processing.
Docs.value: The replacement code point. The default is (U+FFFD).

Docs.summary: Resets the buffer to its initial state as if it were newly created.
